name: Inevitable Greenery
description:
Third person puzzle platformer about a panda in a world of giant plants.

Investigate the town mysteriously covered in huge greenery.

Find out what happened. Was it inevitable? And why?

Water plants that will help you move around.

Collect all 24 flowers to fully master your watering can.

Adorable game with a twist.

Controls:

WASD to walk, SPACE to jump, E to interact

_____________________________________________

Team:

batt_boo: Development, Sounds

Kergerait: Art

Apands: Game design

_____________________________________________

Ludum Dare 50 submission. Theme: Delay the inevitable

Made in Unreal Engine

_____________________________________________

More detailed instructions:

Fill your watering can using wells. If you have enough water - use it on plants. Water small pink flowers to get experience points. Those upgrade your watering can allowing for more water intake. Water treelike plants to grow them into higher platforms. Blue succulent plant fills the watering can after it has grown. Get to the end of the level.
